error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Array'.
error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Function'.
error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'IArguments'.
error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Iterable'.
error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'RegExp'.
error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'String'.
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Boolean'. Did you mean 'boolean'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
emitArrowFunctionES6.ts(10,11): error TS2488: Type '[any]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
emitArrowFunctionES6.ts(11,11): error TS2488: Type '{}' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
emitArrowFunctionES6.ts(12,11): error TS2488: Type '[any, any]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
emitArrowFunctionES6.ts(13,11): error TS2488: Type '[any?, ...any[]]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
emitArrowFunctionES6.ts(14,11): error TS2488: Type '[number?]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
emitArrowFunctionES6.ts(19,12): error TS2488: Type '[{ done: any; value: any; }]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.


!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Array'.
!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Function'.
!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'IArguments'.
!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'Iterable'.
!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'RegExp'.
!!! error TS2318: Cannot find global type 'String'.
!!! error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Boolean'. Did you mean 'boolean'?
!!! error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
!!! error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
==== emitArrowFunctionES6.ts (6 errors) ====
    var f1 = () => { }
    var f2 = (x: string, y: string) => { }
    var f3 = (x: string, y: number, ...rest) => { }
    var f4 = (x: string, y: number, z=10) => { }
    function foo(func: () => boolean) { }
    foo(() => true);
    foo(() => { return false; });
    
    // Binding patterns in arrow functions
    var p1 = ([a]) => { };
              ~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type '[any]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
    var p2 = ([...a]) => { };
              ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type '{}' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
    var p3 = ([, a]) => { };
              ~~~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type '[any, any]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
    var p4 = ([, ...a]) => { };
              ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type '[any?, ...any[]]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
    var p5 = ([a = 1]) => { };
              ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type '[number?]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
    var p6 = ({ a }) => { };
    var p7 = ({ a: { b } }) => { };
    var p8 = ({ a = 1 }) => { };
    var p9 = ({ a: { b = 1 } = { b: 1 } }) => { };
    var p10 = ([{ value, done }]) => { };
               ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2488: Type '[{ done: any; value: any; }]' must have a '[Symbol.iterator]()' method that returns an iterator.
